title: Driving Me Crazy
description: Bestselling author Lisa Suzanne's romantic comedy features rock stars, an older brother's best friend, and a road trip that will change their lives.If opposites attract, my brother’s best friend and I should be perfect for each other.I'm a balanced, ambitious ER nurse, while he's the immature guy in a successful band who's along for the ride. It was just supposed to be a fling, but it was becoming more... until his brush with the law shows me that we can’t be together.And now we have to act like a couple on the cross-country road trip we’re contractually obligated to take.He blasts music I can't stand, stops at strange roadside attractions, and chooses my least favorite restaurants. Despite all that, I still see the sides of him I was falling for.Can we find our way back to each other, or will he just keep driving me crazy?
author: Lisa Suzanne
